channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: A comprehensive resource covering Smart Home Tech, detailed Single Board Computers (SBC) reviews, mini PC, Home Automation, HomeLab upgrades, and Home Assistant guides.

item.title: Radxa Cubie A7A Review: Pi-Sized Power With PCIe, NVMe, USB 3.1 Gen2, Thermals & Real-World Benchmarks
item.description: I benchmarked the Radxa Cubie A7A (Allwinner A733): thermals, Geekbench, LPDDR5, PCIe NVMe, USB 3.1 Gen2, Whisper/HA, and Pi 5 vs Pi 4 comparisons.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
